wasara dekaka kalayak thisse sahal mol himiyange sangamaya akarmanya wi thibima nisa paudgalika molwalin welenda polata sahal sapayimedi arbudakari thaththwayak mathuwa thibe.samajikayan dahasakata wadi pirisakagen samanwithawa dipa wyapthawa kriyathmaka wu sahal mol himiyange sangamaye sabhapathi wijayananda sirisena mahatha athulu samajika pirisak sangamayen iwath wimen pasu eya akarmanya wi thibe.sahal mol himiyange sangamaya akarmanya wimen pasu samastha paudgalika sahal molwalin welanda polata sahal sapayimada mol himiyanta awashya paridi siduwima nisa me arbudakari thaththwaya hatagena thibe.welandapolata maha parimanayen sahal sapayana sahal mol da athuluwa ratapura sahal mol dedahasak pamana thibe.sahal mol himiyange sangamaya kriyathmaka weddi welanda polata sahal sapayima, wi miladi ganima, mila ganan sakachcha kirima athulu karunu poduwe sakachcha kirimakin anathuruwa sidu keruni.eheth danata welanda polata sahal sapayima ee ee mol thama thamanta hithu paridi sidu karagena yayi.wi thoga gabada kara thaba ganimada atham wi mol sathuwa wi metti්rak ton dahas ganan pawathi.
